        public void buildModel​(Loss loss)
        Build the model. Run this after adding layers and before training.
        Parameters:
        loss - an instance of the loss function to use in the model

      • fit

        public void fit​(Matrix input,
                Matrix expected,
                double learningRate,
                int batchSize,
                int epochs,
                java.util.ArrayList<Metric> metrics)
        Train the model on data.
        Parameters:
        input - input data to train on
        expected - expected outputs
        learningRate - learning rate of training
        batchSize - size of each minibatch
        epochs - number of epochs to train for
        metrics - metrics to display

      • fit

        public void fit​(Matrix input,
                Matrix expected,
                double learningRate,
                int batchSize,
                int epochs,
                int logInterval,
                java.util.ArrayList<Metric> metrics)
        Train the model on data.
        Parameters:
        input - input data to train on
        expected - expected outputs
        learningRate - learning rate of training
        batchSize - size of each minibatch
        epochs - number of epochs to train for
        logInterval - log every n epochs
        metrics - metrics to display

      • backPropagate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Matrix> backPropagate​(Matrix expected)
        Backpropagate model after forward propagating input.
        Parameters:
        expected - expected output for model
        Returns:
        errors for each layer from backpropagation
